resources.string: Baby name projects \n(click \'new\' to start a project)

The pattern is a regular expression. For instance: 
 - '.....+' finds names with length greater than 5 letters, 
 - 'R...+' finds name starting with the 'R' letter and length is greater than 4 letters, 
 - '.+r' finds name ending with the 'r' letter.

More informations at https://developer.android.com/reference/java/util/regex/Pattern.html

BabyName v1.0

This application allow you to find out which is your favorite baby name from a collection of +10000 names lexicon arranged by genre and origin (produced by Mike Campbell and Boris New see http://www.lexique.org/public/prenoms.php).

To create a new babyname project press the New Button.

Then youll be asked to set of various name preferences such as gender, name origin and pattern (e.g. longer than, starting with T, etc.).

	To start rating names press the play button, 
	To see the best rated names press the medal button,
	To reset scores press the medal + minus button.
	To delete a project press the evil cross button.

When you have rated all names you will be proposed to start a new loop without the 10 less good rated names.

 Icons originally created by famfamfam http://famfamfam.com.

This application is entirely open-source any suggestion, help or question is welcomed, please go to https://github.com/mdecorde/BABYNAME
Do you really really really want to delete this babyname project?
Do you want to reset this babyname project scores?
